about_the_game:
Step into the shadows of a Victorian-era themed underworld where cunning and stealth reign supreme. Pick-a-Pocket is a multiplayer stealth game that pits you against your friends in a battle to become the king of thieves.

~ View the current top players in the match via the leaderboard. Scores are tallied and shown at the end of every game!
~ Join games seamlessly via Steam invites or lobby codes.
~ Don't want to player by yourself? Fill up to 8 player slots with your friends or AI bots!


~ Master the art of concealment in the murky Victorian night. In Pick-a-Pocket, darkness is your ally. When shrouded in shadows, you become invisible to other players, allowing you to move undetected across the map.
~ Beware - step into the light or get too close to others, and your cover will be blown. This dynamic stealth system creates a tense cat-and-mouse game where timing and positioning are crucial.
~ Will you risk a dash across a lamp lit street for a tempting target, or bide your time in the safety of the shadows?


~ Swipe coins from randomly spawning targets, but beware - your greed may attract unwanted attention!
~ Escalating Excitement: Feel the tension rise as more police flood the streets as the match progresses.
~ Watch out! If the police catch you with their flashlights you will be sent to jail and lose a portion of your earnings.


~ Multi-level Mastery: Navigate elaborate, multi-story maps that reward exploration and tactical thinking.
~ Interactive Environments: Ride steam cars and use elevators to outsmart your opponents and evade capture.


~ Chart your journey from novice pickpocket to master thief with our comprehensive career tracking system.
~ Monitor your progress across 25 different statistics, including level records like "Richest Night" and "Highest Bail Paid."
~ Review your lifetime stats such as "Total Nights Won" and "Total Gold Lost."
~ Learn the Ropes: Master the art of thievery with a fully voiced tutorial.
~ Achievements Galore: Prove your worth with a wide range of challenging achievements.

In Pick-a-Pocket, every shadow conceals an opportunity, and every coin pilfered brings you closer to underworld infamy. Will you emerge as the craftiest cutpurse, or find yourself behind bars? Gather your gang, sharpen your wits, and prepare for a night of high-stakes heists in the gaslit streets of a bygone era.
Can you pick your way to the top of the criminal underworld?

short_description: Stealth your way through Victorian-Era streets and Pickpocket your way to the top. Stay Vigilant as other thieves will be out and about, ready to steal your rewards or as easy marks to increase your stash. Avoid Bobbies, vanish from the light and disappear with your ill-gotten goods by day break.
